name: Tab Age Tracker v1.9.1 (Fixed)
description: This release includes bug fixes for all five issues in v1.9:
changes: Fixed dashboard styling for 'Top 5 Oldest Tabs' section
Fixed search functionality in popup.js by ensuring proper URL construction
Fixed URL paths in openWebDashboard and openWebDashboardWithSearch functions by adding trailing slashes
Restored the missing 'Top 5 Tabs' section in dashboard.html and dashboard.css
Added the displayOldestTabs function to dashboard.js to show the 5 oldest tabs with proper styling
